mushroom.translation[0].definitions[0].d: one of several kinds of fungus with stems and round tops, some of which can be eaten
mushroom.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to grow and develop very quickly
mushroom.translation[1].definitions[0].e: New housing developments mushroomed on the edge of town.
mushroom.translation[2].definitions[0].e: Cable has mushroomed into a giant industry.
